Articles.Content:
The Small Gear Bay is one of those parts that can be loved and hated at the same time.

This example shows off shock absober piston action detail while in the SPH. When the tire interacts with the floor the shock absorber piston will compress. Too bad it does not always work. Only new parts will show off this detail.

I saw this when I began playing KSP 0.23 and loved this small attention to detail. Now after dealing with a featureBug (SmallGearBay Unstable) I again am reminded of this shock absorber detail.
